title: Group portrait of groom wearing moustache, light colored bow tie, and light colored carnation on left lapel, standing with bride, wearing floral headpiece with short veil, earrings, necklace, light colored wedding dress with spaghetti straps, tulle skirt, and light colored bow around waist, wearing flowers on left shoulder, gathered behind table with light colored tablecloth, candles, and three tiered wedding cake, in interior with window with light colored curtains and windmill, horse drawn wagon, and oven patterned wallpaper, possibly on Runett Street in Penn Township
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
